methods.name: getUpdatedRenderTick
javadoc: retrieves the 'date' at which the PartiallyDestroyedBlock was created

methods.name: setProgress
javadoc: inserts damage value into this partially destroyed Block. -1 causes client renderer to delete it, otherwise ranges from 1 to 10

methods.name: updateTick
javadoc: saves the current Cloud update tick into the PartiallyDestroyedBlock
